Interface Visitable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChargingStation, Component, Conveyor, Door, Factory, Position, ProductionMachine, Robot, Room
public interface Visitable
Represents a visitable component in the robot simulation. A visitable component has a position and a name, and can be visited by robots.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getName()
    Gets the name of the visitable component.
    Position
    getVisit()
    Gets the Position of the visitable component.
    int
    getxVisit()
    Gets the X-coordinate of the visitable component.
    int
    getyVisit()
    Gets the X-coordinate of the visitable component.
    boolean
    isCharging()
    Tells if the visitable component is capable of charging.

  • Method Details

    • getVisit

      Position getVisit()
      Gets the Position of the visitable component.
      Returns:
      The Position to visit.

    • getxVisit

      int getxVisit()
      Gets the X-coordinate of the visitable component.
      Returns:
      The X-coordinate of the center of the component.

    • getyVisit

      int getyVisit()
      Gets the X-coordinate of the visitable component.
      Returns:
      The Y-coordinate of the center of the component.

    • isCharging

      boolean isCharging()
      Tells if the visitable component is capable of charging.
      Returns:
      The boolean indicating charging capability.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Gets the name of the visitable component.
      Returns:
      The name of the component.
